2023-11-01.name: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Coleus no Yume
2023-11-01.desc:
Rimuru has saved the children he was teaching in the Kingdom of Engrassia, and his time as a teacher is nearly over. Then Yuuki, Grandmaster of the Free Union, asks him to get to the bottom of the race for the throne in the Kingdom of Coleus, which is located between Engrassia and the Holy Empire of Lubelius. So Rimuru infiltrates Coleus under the name "Satoru," and he finds a nation at the mercy of not only a battle for succession, but a web of schemes woven by demons and vampires!

Source: Crunchyroll

2023-11-02.name: Onimusha
2023-11-02.desc:
With a demonic, soul-consuming weapon in hand, can a legendary swordsman and a samurai brotherhood defeat a bloodthirsty zombie uprising?

Source: Netflix

2023-11-03.name: Eiga Sumikko Gurashi: Tsugihagi Koujou no Fushigi na Ko
2023-11-03.desc:
* Based on a set of fictional characters produced by San-X.

At an old factory on the edge of the forest, the Bear Factory Manager invites the Sumikkos to make toys. They make use of what they are good at, and complete their stuffed toys. The Sumikkos are motivated by the praise of the Bear Factory Manager. They have matching uniforms, delicious food, rooms to stay for the job, and spend their days making one toy after another. Then, the toys that were shipped to Sumikko's town start moving around. There is something "mysterious" about this factory.

Source: Crunchyroll News

2023-11-03.name: Hi no Tori: Eden no Hana
Xixing Ji: Qian Yuan Pian
2023-11-03.desc:
After the westward team was separated, Sha Wujing went to the underworld to save his master; White Wolf Xiaoyu subdued a tiger in the terrifying forest, and was besieged by stone soldiers in the ancient city. Sanzang and others returned to rescue the siege, and Sanzang resolved the resentment of the dead souls. The west team also bid farewell to their old friends and continued Hit the road.

source: bgm.tv/googletranslate

2023-11-07.name: Shen Cang
2023-11-07.desc:
The male protagonist Fang Yi was adopted by an old Taoist and grew up in the "Shangqing Palace" Taoist Temple in Fangshan Mountain. As an adult, he came into contact with antiques by chance, and discovered that he had the ability to give time to objects. In one thought, the world has changed. Welcome to the mysterious world of antiques!

source: movie.douban.com/googletranslate

2023-11-09.name: Akuma-kun (2023)
2023-11-09.desc:
Akuma-kun, a boy raised by a demon, works with his half-human partner Mephisto III as paranormal investigators to solve various murder and mysteries.

Source: netflix

2023-11-10.name: Komada Jouryuusho e Youkoso
2023-11-10.desc:
Koutarou, a novice editor for a web news, visits Komada Distillery for a project on Japanese craft whisky. Led by a young female president Rui who recently took over the family business, the distillery works hard to reproduce its signature whisky KOMA they had to stop making years ago. KOMA was a brand that Rui's grandfather and father had lovingly preserved and an symbol of happiness for all. However, not to mention financial backing, too many clues are missing to revive the whisky once lost. Rui, Koutarou, and the distillery supporters pull together every thread to bring back the whisky filled with family memories.

Source: GAGA

2023-11-23.name: Boku no Daemon
2023-11-23.desc: In the near future, after a nuclear explosion has caused the Earth to collide with Hell, elementary student Kento finds a small daemon creature named Anna and raises her. The series follows the adventures of Kento and Anna as they embark on a journey to rescue his mother.

2023-11-23.name: Gekijouban Sylvanian Families: Freya kara no Okurimono
2023-11-23.desc: * Based on the Sylvanian Families animal toy line.

2023-11-23.name: Koukaku Kidoutai: SAC_2045: Saigo no Ningen
2023-11-23.desc: * Based on Shirou Masamune's original 1989 cyberpunk action manga Ghost in the Shell.

2023-11-25.name: Fanren Xiu Xian Chuan: Di San Ji
2023-11-25.desc: Third season of Fanren Xiu Xian Chuan.

2023-11-25.name: Wu Dong Qiankun Di Si Ji

2023-11-28.name: Onmyouji
2023-11-28.desc:
* Based on a series of historical fantasy short stories and novels written by Yumemakura Baku.

The great onmyoji Abe no Seimei and his partner Minamoto no Hiromasa untangle strange cases surrounding humans and demons.

Source: netflix

2023-11-29.name: Zhen Wu Dianfeng 3rd Season
2023-11-29.desc:
After the Zhenwu God's Order was activated, Nie Feng learned that he was the reincarnation of the God King. He was burdened with a heavy past and embarked on a new journey to find the truth and slay evil!

source: movie.douban.com
